release.title: G. GOULD
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}G. GOULD{~/i~} is a 45 minute composition based on a single field recording with sparse manipulations and collaging. It is a reaction to and partial recreation of James Benning's recent film 'L. COHEN', as well as a reaction to the impact that artists like Leonard Cohen and Glenn Gould have had on Canadian culture. {~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/g-gould"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}180510.180528.180602.{~/i~} is a 60 minute reductionist electronic composition which focuses on the mutation of filtered textures over time.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/180510180528180602"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Plein Soleil
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Plein Soleil{~/i~} is a single 69 minute electronic composition, constructed exclusively from sounds extracted from the song of the same name by world's end girlfriend.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/plein-soleil"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Musik kann marschieren
release.label: Wisteria Records
release.description: {~i~}Musik kann marschieren{~/i~} is the debut release by Good Old Neon, the collaborative project by brothers Connor and Owen Kurtz. It is a single 56 minute electronic improvisation, combined with a field recording collage created by each member.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/musik-kann-marschieren-2"~}Wisteria Records bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Lines 1 & 2
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Lines 1 & 2{~/i~} includes the first two realizations of Lines, a randomized situation for sound collage, each taking their own disc. The {~i~}Lines{~/i~} system ensures a constant shift of sonic density in the realization, as well as making it so the realization is completely circular, having no beginning or ending. The first realization uses electronic noise, and the second uses everyday recordings.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/lines-1-2"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: First Snow
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}First Snow{~/i~} is the first double album by Important Hair and the debut release of compositions by Connor Kurtz. It includes {~i~}First Snow{~/i~} an analogue synthesizer piece which is realized in an hour-long solo edit and a 20 minute trio edit, {~i~}9 Movements{~/i~}, a minimalist work for electric keyboard, {~i~}For On Kawara{~/i~}, a tribute for the conceptual minimalist performed on three live sources of static and {~i~}The Death of John Cage{~/i~}, an original poem which becomes the basis of a sound collage.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/first-snow"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: You Are Crying, My Child
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}You Are Crying, My Child{~/i~} is the debut release of Connor Kurtz's Important Hair project. It is a venture into the more experimental side of analog electronic noise. The album is partially written, partially improvised and partially collaged, using lyrics extracted from Samuel Beckett 1938 novel {~i~}Murphy{~/i~}{~br /~}{~br /~} The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/you-are-crying-my-child"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Miscellaneous Works, 2018
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Miscellaneous Works, 2018{~/i~} collects several electronic compositions made throughout the year of 2018.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/miscellaneous-works-2018"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Miscellaneous Works, 2017
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Miscellaneous Works, 2017{~/i~} collects several compositions, collages, experiments and electronic improvisations made throughout the year of 2017.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/miscellaneous-works-2017"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Miscellaneous Works, 2016
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Miscellaneous Works, 2016{~/i~} is the first installment in Important Hair's annual {~i~}Miscellaneous Works{~/i~} series. It includes 8 tracks, including colleges, improvisations and a composition for acoustic guitars.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/miscellaneous-works-2016"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: War Is Peace, Freedom Is Slavery, Ignorance Is Strength
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}War Is Peace, Freedom Is Slavery, Ignorance Is Strength{~/i~} is an album by Texas-based electronic musician Acialist. It contains four short interlude tracks which were created by Important Hair.{~br /~}{~br /~}It is available for free download here: {~a target="_blank" href="https://acialisms.bandcamp.com/album/war-is-peace-freedom-is-slavery-ignorance-is-strength"~}https://acialisms.bandcamp.com/album/war-is-peace-freedom-is-slavery-ignorance-is-strength{~/a~}

release.title: Free Improvisation February: Vol. 1
release.label: Wisteria Records
release.description: {~i~}Free Improvisation February: Vol. 1{~/i~} is a 19 track compilation, which includes various styles of improvised music. It includes a 29 minute track by Important Hair.{~br /~}{~br /~}It is available for free download here: {~a target="_blank" href="https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/free-improvisation-february-vol-1"~}https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/free-improvisation-february-vol-1{~/a~}

release.title: Noisevember: Vol. 1
release.label: Wisteria Records
release.description: {~i~}Noisevember: Vol. 1{~/i~} is a compilation which explores several different styles of noise music. It includes a 16 minute track by Important Hair, titled {~i~}First Loser{~/i~}. {~br /~}{~br /~}It is available for free download here: {~a target="_blank" href="https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/noisevember-vol-1"~}https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/noisevember-vol-1{~/a~}
